mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(no_code, no_id, no_title, no_subject, no_date, filecode, no_status) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(NO_CODE),0)+1 FROM NOTICE ),'첫번째','title', '첫번째',sysdate,'첫번째11232','공지사항1')
INSERT INTO NOTICE(no_code, no_id, no_title, no_subject, no_date, filecode, no_status) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(NO_CODE),0)+1 FROM NOTICE ),#{no_id},#{no_title}, #{no_subject},sysdate,null,'1')
